hero.title: Your Strategic AI Implementation Partner in Central Europe.
hero.subtitle: We don't just write code. We engineer agentic AI systems that scale with your governance requirements. Secure. Compliant. Future-proof.

items.title: AI Readiness Audit
items.desc: Comprehensive analysis of your data infrastructure, governance, and AI potential. We identify risks before they become liabilities.

items.title: Pilot Implementation
items.desc: Rapid deployment of functional MVP agents. Test viability in 4 weeks with strict success metrics.

items.title: Enterprise Transformation
items.desc: Full-scale integration of custom LLMs and RAG pipelines. Built for security, compliance (EU AI Act), and massive scale.

footer.tagline: Bridging the gap between Western capital and Central European engineering talent.
